---
node_id: 7
title: Load Transcript History (7)
---
### Loads the transcript history, requiring the code to accept the history state as input and on initialization, load content directly from the file.

We need to load the transcript history. For loading transcript history, the code must be able to take the history state as input. On initialization, it should just load whatever is in the file.
